name: collections::binary_heap::BinaryHeap::<T, A>::append

vec::Vec::<T, A>::len.doc:
Returns the number of elements in the vector, also referred to
 as its 'length'.

 # Examples

 ```
 let a = vec![1, 2, 3];
 assert_eq!(a.len(), 3);
 ```

collections::binary_heap::BinaryHeap::<T.doc: Rebuild assuming data[0..start] is still a proper heap.
